段: 若去做工課呼，提錢轉來予伊就提；啊若是早時仔較早卜去做工課，講煮彼糜仔泔泔泔來予食，啊彼大官仔講：「彼啥物名你著……」（伊號做阿英仔）伊講：「阿英、阿英仔、你彼泔糜仔麼煮一个較涸 咧，啊猶擱燒滾滾,啊我呰老啊，一下仔子就枵啊，無法度培蕃薯股種蕃薯，一下仔子就枵去啊呼，抑無你蕃薯麼加斲二箍仔……」啊講：「Enn7，卜食偌 好？卜通仔赫 好好食？」啊毋予食，啊毋予食，啊算講共罵講：「你這个夭壽仔，你這夭壽仔，你生子無較瘥 啦，你若生子呼，你後擺若像你安呢……」啊真貪心，呼，真貪心。咱知影若少年人呼若共人提錢呼，啊若毋知影就講咱都毋知，啊若知影愛緊還人。

Na7 khi3 cho3 khang-khoe3 honnh, theh8 chinn5 tng2 lai5 hou7 i to7 theh8; ah na7 si7 cha2-si5-a2 khah-cha2 beh khi3 cho3 khang-khoe3, kong2 chu2 he moai5-a2 am2-am2-am2 lai5 hou7 chiah8, ah he ta-koann-a2 kong2,“He siann2-mih mia5 li2 tioh8…… ”（i ho7-cho3 A-eng-a2）i kong2,“A-eng, A-eng-a2, li2 he am2-moai5-a2 ma7 chu2 chit8 e5 khah kho2 leh, ah iau2 koh sio kun2 kun2, ah goa2 chiah lau7 ah, chit8-e7-a2 kiann2 to7 iau ah, bo5 hoat-tou7 poe7 han-chi5 kou2 cheng3 han-chi5, chit8-e7-a2 kiann2 to7 iau khi3 ah honnh, iah-bo5 li2 han-chi5 ma7 ke tok--nng7-khou-a2…… ” ah kong2,“Enn7, beh chiah8 joa7 ho2?  Beh thang-a2 hiah ho2-ho2 chiah8? ” ah m7 hou7 chiah8, ah m7 hou7 chiah8, ah sng3 kong2 ka7 me7 kong2,“Li2 chit e5 iau2-siu7-a2, li2 che iau2-siu7-a2, li2 senn-kiann2 bo5 khah-choah8 lah, li2 na7 senn-kiann2 honnh, li2 au7-pai2 na7-chhiunn7 li2 an2-ne…… ” ah chin tham-sim, honnh, chin tham-sim.  Lan2 chai-iann2 na7 siau3-lian5 lang5 honnh na7 ka7 lang5 theh8 chinn5 honnh, ah na7 m7 chai-iann2 to7 kong2 lan2 to7 m7 chai, ah na7 chai-iann2 ai3 kin2 heng5 lang5.

啊一个囝仔呼，六歲啊呢，呰大漢啊呢，啊講……較早無人彼擔彼號啥婆姐衣 啦呼，啊擔彼號啥物花粉出來得賣無，（邊仔人補充：賣什細啦），henn7，阮彼有一个老歲仔六十外 歲啊啦，就是像安呢擔彼婆姐衣，號做七月半，擔婆姐衣啦，擔彼七娘媽啥，擔彼出來賣（邊仔人補充：賣搖鼓的啦），啊彼一个婆姐衣講啥物五角銀爾爾，呼，較早的錢才五角銀，一个五角銀；啊擱一盒膨粉 五角，啊擱一个紅繡線安呢毋，啊鬥鬥當是講二箍銀抑是 偌濟，一个五角，啊彼箍半銀，啊講提五百箍予找，啊彼阿姆仔實在是足夭壽的，六十外歲啊呢，啊講提五百箍予找，啊五百箍伊就……啊彼五百箍毋就愛擱找伊，啊五百箍啊煞無找伊，啊講自彼的粉煞共提去，啊伊記得去啦，伊記講伊的五百箍予伊，啊記講啊當五百箍愛擱找伊偌濟錢，啊無找伊講，自彼粉提予伊，啊彼五百箍續捒予伊，啊擱亦一个膨粉，啊擱一个婆姐衣予伊，啊擱行、行一截仔啊講越轉來共討，啊轉來共討講毋還伊，講伊無，毋是講無，講：「Enn7，你家己卜予我的。你家己卜予我的，亦毋是我共你討的。」

Ah chit8 e5 gin2-a2 honnh, lak8 hoe3 ah neh, chiah toa7-han3 ah neh, ah kong2…… khah-cha2 bo5 lang5 hit tann3 hit-ho7 siann2 po5-chia2-i lah honnh, ah tann hit-ho7 siann2-mih hoe hun2 chhut lai5 teh be7 bo5,（pinn-a2 lang5 pou2-chhiong: be7 chap8-se3 lah）, henn7, goan2 hia u7 chit8 e5 lau7-hoe3-a2 lak8-chap8-goa7 hoe3 ah lah, to7-si7 chhiunn7 an2-ne tann he po5-chia2-i, ho7-cho3 chhit goeh8-poann3, tann po5-chia2-i lah, tann he chhit-niu5-ma2 siann2, tann he chhut lai5 be7（pinn-a2 lang5 pou2-chhiong: be7 io5-kou2 e5 lah）, ah he chit8 e5 po5-chia2-i kong2 siann2-mih gou7-kak gin5 nia7-nia7, honnh, khah-cha2 e5 chinn5 chiah gou7-kak gin5, chit8 e5 gou7-kak gin5; ah koh chit8 ap8 phong3-hun2 gou7-kak, ah koh chit8 e5 ang5 siu3-soann3 an2-ne m7, ah tau3-tau3 tann si7 kong2 nng7 khou gin5 iah si7 joa7 che7, chit8 e5 gou7-kak, ah he khou poann3 gin5, ah kong2 theh8 gou7-pah khou hou7 chau7, ah he a-m2-a2 sit8-chai7 si7 chiok iau2-siu7 e5, lak8-chap8-goa7 hoe3 ah neh, ah kong2 theh8 gou7-pah khou hou7 chau7, ah gou7-pah khou i to7…… ah he gou7-pah khou m7-to7 ai3 koh chau7 i, ah gou7-pah khou ah soah bo5 chau7 i, ah kong2 chu7 hit e5 hun2 soah ka7 theh8--khi3, ah i be7 ki3-tit khi3 lah, i be7 ki3 kong2 i e5 gou7-pah khou hou7 i, ah be7 ki3 kong2 ah tann gou7-pah khou ai3 koh chau7 i joa7 che7 chinn5, ah bo5 chau7 i kong2, chu7 he hun2 theh8 hou7 i, ah he gou7-pah khou soa3 sak hou7 i, ah koh iah8 chit8 e5 phong3-hun2, ah koh chit8 e5 po5-chia2-i hou7 i, ah koh kiann5, kiann5 chit8 chah-a2 ah kong2 oat8 tng2 lai5 ka7 tho2, ah tng2 lai5 ka7 tho2 kong2 m7 heng5 i, kong2 i bo5, m7 si7 kong2 bo5, kong2,“Enn7, li2 ka-ki7 beh hou7 goa2 e5.  Li2 ka-ki7 beh hou7 goa2 e5, iah8 m7 si7 goa2 ka7 li2 tho2 e5.”
啊彼个老歲仔huan5在 彼嘴足毒e5，噯喲，我看著足驚e5，嘴足毒e5：「Enn7，你共我提彼二箍半銀，你就去買四塊枋來貯您彼个死囝仔子。」喂，對對，一个六歲囝仔，今仔日予詈爾，明仔載死翹翹。彼實在有夠毒e5，我彼看著足驚e5，若合少年人，我當若共人買菜呼，人找毋著予我，我毋知影我毋知，若知影我一箍我麼提去還伊，我麼拚去還伊。

Ah hit e5 lau7-hoe3-a2 hoan5-chai7 he chhui3 chiok tok8 e5, aih-ioh, goa2 khoann3 tioh8 chiok kiann e5, chhui3 chiok tok8 e5:“ Enn7, li2 ka7 goa2 theh8 hit nng7 khou poann3 gin5, li2 to7 khi3 be2 si3 te3 pang lai5 te2 lin2 hit e5 si2 gin2-a2 kiann2.” Oeh, tui3-tui3, chit8 e5 lak8 hoe3 gin2-a2, kin-a2-jit8 hou7 le2 nia5, bin5-a2-chai3 si2-khiau3-khiau3.  He sit8-chai7 u7-kau3 tok8 e5, goa2 he khoann3 tioh8 chiok kiann e5, na7 kap siau3-lian5 lang5, goa2 tann na7 ka7 lang5 be2 chhai3 honnh, lang5 chau7 m7-to7 hou7 goa2, goa2 m7 chai-iann2 goa2 m7 chai, na7 chai-iann2 goa2 chit8 khou goa2 ma7 theh8 khi3 heng5 i, goa2 ma7 piann3 khi3 heng5 i.

無看無知，厝邊仔呢，彼六歲囝仔偌勥 呢你知毋知，若看伊割稻仔轉來呼，茶就捾來，椅仔就拖來，猶得食乳呢，六歲囝仔猶擱食一个乳頭仔[口+束][口+束]咧安呢才有過癮 呢。喂，下早起卜晝仔共詈爾，明仔載差不多二點外鐘爾爾，佇咧西瓜寮仔食西瓜哦，下晝時仔佇彼剖西瓜，啊食西瓜講，較早的人囝仔，查甫囝仔攏無予穿褲呼，啊西瓜食予滴啊，食到尾仔top8-top8滴 啊，食到尾仔歸身軀啊就西瓜top8-top8滴毋，一時仔子爾，啊彼khi1-khi1 khong1-khong1，khi1-khi1 khong1-khong1就翹去啊哦。

Bo5 khoann3 bo5 chai, chhu3-pinn-a2 neh, he lak8 hoe3 gin2-a2 joa7 khiang3 neh li2 chai m7 chai, na7 khoann3 i koah tiu7-a2 tng2--lai5 honnh, te5 to koann7 lai5, i2-a2 to7 thoa lai5, iau2 teh chiah8 leng neh, lak8 hoe3 gin2-a2 iau2 koh chiah8 chit8 e5 leng thau5-a2 suh-suh leh an2-ne chiah u7 koe3-gian3 neh.  Oeh, e7-chai2-khi2 beh-tau3-a2 ka7 le2 nia5, bin5-a2-chai3 chha-put-to nng7 tiam2 goa7 cheng nia7-nia7, ti7 leh si-koe liau5-a2 chiah8 si-koe ouh, e7-tau3 si5-a2 ti7 hia phoa3 si-koe, ah chiah8 si-koe kong2, khah-cha2 e5 lang5 gin2-a2, cha-pou gin2-a2 long2 bo5 hou7 chheng7-khou3 honnh, ah si-koe chiah8 hou7 teh ah, chiah8 kau3 boe2--a2 top8-top8 teh ah, chiah8 kau3 boe2--a2 kui seng-khu ah to7 si-koe top8-top8 teh m7, chit8-si5-a2-kiann2 nia5, ah he khi-khi khong-khong, khi-khi khong-khong to khiau--khi3 ah ouh.

去問神明講：「你貪心，共人提著人的金錢無還人，去予人詈。」啊有影彼老歲仔嘴有夠毒。伊共詈講：「你共我提彼个錢呼，你就是去買四塊枋來貯您彼个死囝仔子。」安呢爾爾，安呢共詈咧爾爾，講就隨 死。啊我麼共講，講：「你麼罵彼个大漢的，呼，啊大漢的毋罵，啊你來罵彼个囝仔？」啊正經 罵彼个囝仔，早起卜晝仔共罵爾，明仔載二點外鐘就隨翹去。亦 無破病！啊就佇彼睏，啊剖西瓜，啊就佇彼睏，啊睏睏起來啊「Phoo5-phoo5」，一下仔子就翹去啊。送去醫生都無法哩啊。啊才去問神，去埔仔，去咱……彼有無？彼較早竹圍仔有得問神有無？去問神，講：「你這呼，你這个人呼，做了無好，啊去共人提人的金錢，啊彼老歲仔赫濟歲啊，擱共你討，你擱堅持擱毋還人，你應該……當若正經若找毋著，若找毋著當毋知影就毋知影……」

Khi3 mng7 sin5-beng5 kong2,“Li2 tham-sim, ka7 lang5 theh8 tioh8 lang5 e5 kim-chinn5 bo5 heng5 lang5, khi3 hou7 lang5 le2.”ah u7-iann2 he lau7-hoe3-a2 chhui3 u7-kau3 tok8.  I ka7 le2 kong2,“Li2 ka7 goa2 theh8 hit e5 chinn5 honnh, li2 to7-si7 khi3 be2 si3 te3 pang lai5 te2 lin2 hit e5 si2 gin2-a2 kiann2.”an2-ne nia7-nia7, an2-ne ka7 le2 leh nia7-nia7, kong2 to7 sui5 si2.  Ah goa2 ma7 ka7 kong2, kong2,“Li2 ma7 me7 hit e5 toa7-han3--e5, honnh, ah toa7-han3 e5 m7 me7, ah li2 lai5 me7 hit e5 gin2-a2? ” ah cheng3-keng me7 hit e5 gin2-a2, chai2-khi2 beh-tau3-a2 ka7 me7 nia5, bin5-a2-chai3 nng7 tiam2 goa7 cheng to sui5 khiau--khi3.  Iah8 bo5 phoa3-penn7!  Ah to7 ti7 hia khun3, ah phoa3 si-koe, ah to7 ti7 hia khun3, ah khun3-khun3--khi2-lai5 ah “Phou5-phou5”, chit8-e7-a2 kiann2 to7 khiau--khi3 ah.  Sang3 khi3 i-seng to7 bo5 hoat-lih ah.  Ah chiah khi3 mng7-sin5, khi3 pou-a2, khi3 lan2…… hia u7--bo5?  Hia khah-cha2 tek-ui5-a2 u7 teh mng7-sin5 u7--bo5?  Khi3 mng7-sin5, kong2,“Li2 chia honnh, li2 chit e5 lang5 honnh, cho3 liau2 bo5 ho2, ah khi3 ka7 lang5 theh8 lang5 e5 kim-chinn5, ah he lau7-hoe3-a2 hiah che7 hoe3 ah, koh ka7 li2 tho2, li2 koh kian-chhi5 koh m7 heng5 lang5, li2 eng3-kai…… tann na7 cheng3-keng na7 chau7 m7-to7, na7 chau7 m7-to7 tann m7 chai-iann2 to7 m7 chai-iann2…… ”
Eh4，當二箍半銀害死一个子，六歲囝仔著飼偌久你想看覓。啊你當若像講倩 人[毛^火]，著偌濟錢，一個月二萬箍，看著[毛^火]偌濟錢？一个仔子就無命去啊，你共想看覓仔。
